sampleDescriptions: Advocate for client before members of the U.S. House of Representatives, U.S. Senate, and staffs to each, and before the Department of Health and Human Services, sub-agencies, and staffs to each, with respect to coverage and pricing issues; review relevant statutes and regulations regarding same.
